definition: sound/acoustics/audio/hi-fi system/stereo sound system/abbr. for 組合音響|组合音响[zu3 he2 yin1 xiang3]
sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)
echo/sound/noise/to make a sound/to sound/to ring/loud/classifier for noises
hi-fi system/stereo sound system/abbr. to 音響|音响[yin1 xiang3]

sentences.english: Attica is defined by avantgarde design and top-notch sound from a world-class system.
sentences.chinese: 愛奇多被評爲設計前衛且音響設備頂尖的俱樂部。

sentences.english: Ltd. is a company specializing in development, production and sales on audio equipment.
sentences.chinese: 公司主要從事專業音響器材的研製，生產及銷售。

sentences.english: It is a fusion of high-end acoustics and professional output power.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個高端和專業音響輸出功率融合。

sentences.english: I kindly told him to turn it down a little bit.
sentences.chinese: 我友善地告訴他，把音響的音量關小點。

sentences.english: IMAX six-channel super audio system includes subwoofer channel.
sentences.chinese: IMAX六聲道超級音響系統包含有超低音頻道。

sentences.english: Sheldon:We could put her stereo back there.
sentences.chinese: 我們可以把她的立體音響放在後面。

sentences.english: And in retail, music devices are different from plasma TVs.
sentences.chinese: 而在零售業，音響設備不同於等離子電視。

sentences.english: There is a TV set, a stereo system and a number of chairs in the sitting room.
sentences.chinese: 客廳裏有一臺電視機，一套組合音響和一些椅子。

sentences.english: Zhi imitated the natural sounds of wood and streams to make music.
sentences.chinese: 質“模仿山林溪谷的天籟音響製作了樂歌。

sentences.english: Yeah, the lighting and sound effects are first-class.
sentences.chinese: 嗯，舞臺燈光和音響效果都是一流的。

sentences.english: They think the sound effects in the cinema attracts them forever.
sentences.chinese: 他們感覺電影院的音響效果是永遠吸引他們的地方。

sentences.english: This leads to four voices and a richer sound.
sentences.chinese: 這會得到四種聲音和更豐富的音響。

sentences.english: She sings along with the car stereo on the drive over.
sentences.chinese: 她邊開車邊跟着汽車音響唱歌。

sentences.english: Both the light and sound equipments are the state-of -art.
sentences.chinese: 燈光與音響設備都是最尖端的。

sentences.english: The other position is the light sound of the VM1, ideal for female vocals.
sentences.chinese: 其他位置是VM1，女主唱理想的燈光音響。

sentences.english: The sound effect in BaoLi cinema is great and I enjoyed myself.
sentences.chinese: 保利影院的音響效果不錯，非常享受。

definition: the scene (of a crime, accident etc)/(on) the spot/(at) the site
